name: KidKraft_Blue_Airplane_Bookcase
reviews: The grandson loves his new airplane bed and bookcase. Would purchase again.
Easy to assemble and holds a lot of books and toys. Our sons loves to spin the propeller. Taller books will not fit on the shelves, though.
It looks just like the picture! !
The bookshelf was easy to assemble and it's sturdy. My son loves it, but it's a bit small.

This shelf is the perfect height for a toddler to put books on and toys. My son loves to spin the propeller as well (It does spin). I would suggest a drill with a small bit to add a few of your own pilot (no pun intended haha) holes in case they don't line up exactly right. All in all a cute bookshelf, lightweight and very accessible to a small child, but don't even attempt assembly without at least a little bit of handy skills and patience.
My 4 year old son loves it. Came with a few scratches/dents-but mostly on the backside. The screw on the propeller keeps falling off.
Sturdy, well made, looks great in 2 year olds bedroom and holds his books and some toys. He loves it!
description:
It's time to takeoff and fly away with our adorable Airplane Bookcase. The young aviators in your life are sure to love this fun, convenient furniture piece.
Brand: KidKraftModel: 76270Materials: MDF, woodColor: BlueDimensions: 31.55 inches high x 10.25 inches deep x 28.88 inches wideWeight: 29.7 poundsGenderBoysAssemblyAssembly Required
